title: Calorie Accounting - Mandy Levy
description:

Calorie Accounting is a fun and funny, cool and creative, visual and vibrant lifestyle how-to that delivers the skinny on the arithmetic of weight loss. Typically, thereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s nothing less enjoyable than being fat and preferring not to be, but Calorie Accounting finally allows us to cut the crap and face this thing head onÃ¢â‚¬â€with jokes, puns, humiliating photos, and self-deprecation!
